column4: Microsoft makes Teams primary teamwork hub  replacing Skype for Business
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Microsoft Corp's Teams application will be replacing Skype for Business as the company’s primary teamwork software  Microsoft said on Monday  in its latest effort to defend against the threat of upstart Slack in the workplace collaboration software market.

column4: CORRECTED-Microsoft makes Teams primary teamwork hub  replacing Skype for Business
column5: SAN FRANCISCO  Sept 25 Microsoft Corp's Teams application will be replacing Skype for Business as the company’s primary teamwork software  Microsoft said on Monday  in its latest effort to defend against the threat of upstart Slack in the workplace collaboration software market.
